title: New Bill Targets Deepfake Offenders in Wake of Taylor Swift Controversy
description: In response to the proliferation of explicit AI images, particularly those targeting high-profile individuals like Taylor Swift, the United States Senate has put forth a new bill to address the issue of nonconsensual, sexual deepfakes.  This proposed legislation seeks to criminalize the dissemination of such content without the consent of the individual depicted, providing victims […]
